BasicInfo.short: Lunera designs and markets high performance commercial LED lamps.

Products.name: Susan Lamp Family of Metal Halide Replacements
Products.description: The Susan Lamp brings huge energy savings and enables your metal halide fixtures to deliver high-quality, instant-on light.

Products.name: Helen Lamp Linear Tube Replacements
Products.description: Plug and play LED replacements for T8 and T5HO linear fluorescent tubes

Products.name: Helen Lamp Family of CFL Replacements
Products.description: With the Helen Lamp by Lunera, there’s no reason to stick with CFL lighting. Bring the brilliance of natural light to your spaces today!

Products.name: Lucy Lamp Family of High-Pressure Sodium Replacements
Products.description: Just screw the Lucy Lamp into your existing high-pressure sodium (HPS) fixture to convert to LED. There’s no need to bypass the ballast.
